alert.note: Alert for Champaign; De Witt; McLean; Piatt (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 29 at 5:29AM CDT until June 29 at 6:30AM CDT by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northern Piatt County in central Illinois... Northeastern De Witt County in central Illinois... Southeastern McLean County in central Illinois... Western Champaign County in east central Illinois... * Until 630 AM CDT. * At 527 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Le Roy, or 14 miles southeast of Bloomington, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Broadcast media. At 525 AM CDT, quarter size hail was reported at Downs Rd and State Route 136 east of Heyworth. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is expected. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Farmer City around 545 AM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Mansfield. This includes Interstate 74 between mile markers 143 and 166. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
